div.head: CHAP. III.
1 The sonnes of Dauid. 10 His line to Zedekiah. 17 The successors of Ieconiah.
div.ab: Now these were the sonnes of Dauid, which were borne vnto him in Hebron. The first borne Amnon, of Ahinoam the Iesreelitesse: the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitesse: 2.Sam.3.2 , Iosh.15.56. , Or, Chileab, 2.sam.3.3.
The third, Absalom the sonne of Maacha, the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adoniah the sonne of Haggith:
The fifth, Shephatia of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife. 2.Sam.3.5.
These sixe were borne vnto him in Hebron, and there hee reigned seuen yeeres, and sixe moneths: and in Ierusalem he reigned thirty and three yeres.

And these were borne vnto him in Ierusalem. Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, foure, of Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel. 2.Sam.5. 14. , Or, Shammua, 2.Sam.5.14. , Or, Bethsabe, 2.Sam. 11.13. , Or, Eliam, 2.Sam.11.3
Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet, Or, Elishua 2.Sam.5.15.
And Noga, and Nepheg, and Iaphia,
And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine. Or, Beliada, 1. Chro. 14.7.
These were all the sonnes of Dauid: beside the sonnes of the concubines, and Tamar their sister. 2. Sam. 13.1.
¶ And Solomons sonne was Rehoboam: Abia his sonne: Asa his son: Iehoshaphat his sonne: 1.King.11 43. & 15.8 , Or, Abiam, 1.king.15.1
Ioram his sonne: Ahaziah his sonne: Ioash his sonne: Or, Azariah, 2. chr. 22. 6. & 21.17.
Amaziah his sonne: Azariah his sonne: Iotham his sonne: Or, Vzziah 2.king.15.30.
Ahaz his sonne: Hezekiah his sonne: Manasseh his sonne:
Amon his sonne: Iosiah his sonne.

And the sonnes of Iosiah were: the first borne Iohanan, the second Ioakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Sallum. Or, Ioachaz, 2.king.23.30. , Or, Eliakim, 2.king. 23.34. , Or, Mathania, 2.kin. 24.17.
And the sonnes of Ioakim: Ieconiah his sonne, Zedekiah his sonne. Mat.1.11. , Or, Iehoiachin, 2. king. 24.6. , Or, Coniah, ier. 22.24.
¶ And the sonnes of Ieconiah, Assir, Salathiel his sonne, Or, Iehoiachin, 2. king. 24.6. , Heb. Shealtiel. , 2.King. 24.17. being his vncle. , Mat.1.12
Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Iecamiah, Hosama, and Nedabiah.
And the sonnes of Pedaiah were: Zerubbabel, and Shimei: And the sonne of Zerubbabel, Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister.
And Hazubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, & Hasadiah, Iushabhesed, fiue.
And the sonnes of Hananiah, Pelatiah, and Iesaiah: the sonnes of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sonnes of Obadiah, the sonnes of Sechaniah.
And the sonnes of Sechaniah, Semaiah: and the sonnes of Semaiah, Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, sixe.
And the sonnes of Neariah: Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three. Heb. Hiskijah.
And the sonnes of Elioenai, were: Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Iohanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seuen.
